scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook
scripts.deploy: cd ../.. && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin main && cd part3/phonebook && npm run deploy
